subject: Helpspiritsgetacross
author: Nick
full_text:
Mom
    I heard this one loud and clear.  Did you slow it down?  I heard it all as labelled except the 
ending.  I heard "you're lucky" or looking.  Though its the same syllables as "here fluffy" so.. 
what ev.   I'm wondering if the people faster comment was for you to speed it up.  They have 
seemed to tell me to speed it up or slow it down and even to boost it.

Peace,
Nick
